User.title: User
User.description: Represents a user in the MarketConnect application.

uid.description: Unique identifier for the User entity, matching Firebase Auth UID.

role.description: The user's role within the application (customer, provider, or admin).

createdAt.description: The timestamp when the user account was created.

admin.description: Grants administrator-level access to the application.

definition.description: Stores user profile information. Includes denormalized 'role' field for authorization independence. This allows list operations to be secured using role-based access control.

params.name: userId
params.description: The unique identifier for the user.
